devdoc.author: MDT Team
devdoc.details: Share data and receive MDT reward

canClaimReward().details: Check if the caller address has claimable reward.
canClaimReward().return: true if the caller has claimable reward.

cancelRewards(address[],uint256[]).details: Cancel expired data rewards if users don't claim within a certain period. (contract owner only)

params._addresses: address[] Addressses that have expired data rewards.
params._values: uint256[] Amount of tokens to cancel from an address.

contractTokenBalance().details: Get token balance of this contract.
contractTokenBalance().return: the token balance of this contract.

deliverRewards(address[],uint256[]).details: Deliver data rewards to users. (contract owner only)

params._addresses: address[] Addresses that MDT users binded to receive data rewards.

emergencyERC20Drain(address,uint256).details: Transfer to owner any tokens send by mistake to this contract. (contract owner only)

params._token: ERC20 The address of the token to transfer.
params.amount: uint256 The amount to be transferred.

getClaimableValue().details: Get amount of claimable tokens for the caller address.

getRewardRecord().details: Get reward record for the caller.
getRewardRecord().return: a tuple of reward record (claimableValue, totalTokensClaimed, lastClaimedTime, initialized, enabled).

getRewardRecordForAddress(address).details: Get reward record for address. (contract owner only)
getRewardRecordForAddress(address).return: a tuple of reward record (claimableValue, totalTokensClaimed, lastClaimedTime, initialized, enabled).

getTotalTokensClaimed().details: Get total tokens claimed for the caller address.

isAddressBound().details: Check if the caller address is bound to the contract. (ever setup via deliverRewards or setRewardEnabled)
isAddressBound().return: true if the caller address is bound.

resume().details: Resume the data reward contract. (contract owner only)

setRewardEnabled(address,bool).details: Set data reward to enabled or disabled for a wallet address. (contract owner only)

params._isEnabled: true to set reward to be enabled.

setRewardsEnabled(address[],bool).details: Set data rewards to enabled or disabled for a list of wallet addresses. (contract owner only)

params._isEnabled: true to set rewards to be enabled.

suspend().details: Suspend the data reward contract. (contract owner only)

tokenBalanceOf(address).details: Get token balance of a wallet address.
tokenBalanceOf(address).return: the token balance of a wallet address.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferReward(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer tokens between wallets, used when user binds the account to a different wallet address. (contract owner only)

params._amount: amount of tokens to be transfered
params._fromAddress: address The wallet address to transfer tokens from
params._toAddress: address The wwallet address to transfer tokens to

withdrawTokens(address,uint256).details: Withdraw tokens from the contract. (contract owner only)
